description: A long marble-topped bar counter with dark wood shelving, typical of upscale establishments

core:description.text: A long marble-topped bar counter with dark wood shelving behind. Glass cloches line the surface, and rows of wine bottles and neatly stacked stemware are arranged on the shelves. A stainless work area and sink sit below the counter.
